title: Does Bill Clinton Have an Illegitimate Son Named Danney Williams?
subtitle: An all-but-forgotten '90s tabloid story accusing Bill Clinton of fathering a "love child" with a black prostitute has been resurrected just in time for the 2016 presidential election.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Bill Clinton fathered an illegitimate, mixed-race son named Danney Williams with an Arkansas prostitute in 1985.
